data.actual_result: It starts removing from what you've typed in before autocompleting and doesn't remove the autocomplete portion up until there is nothing else behind it to remove.
data.expected_result: Doing `ctrl + z` removes the whole emoji name.
data.short_description: With autocomplete suggestions, after you've clicked on a suggestion to complete your `:emojiname:` for an example, and do `ctrl + z`, it will start removing from what you've typed in before you've clicked on a suggestion instead of removing the whole `:emojiname:`. Same with all autocomplete suggestions.
data.steps_to_repro: - Use emoji matching to complete an emoji name - Do `ctrl + z`
